problem.p: My answer to part 1 is justified because:

choicegroup.choice: The object is only translating and not rotating.
An observer in the x-y plane near point A will see the object as changing angle more quickly than one near D.
An observer in the x-y plane near point D will be farther from the line of the object's motion than one at A.
The points shown are not in line with the center of the object.
The x component of the distance from the object to the points is the same for all points.
